snippet.title: SimTower gameplay (PC Game, 1994)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for SimTower (aka sim tower - the vertical empire), PC game produced by Maxis Software in 1994 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/simtower/4307/
Playing this simulation/stragegy game by Maxis where you have to build a tower and manage it while growing bigger.
Played through emulated Windows (Win 98/Win XP) virtual machine.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
SimPark - https://youtu.be/P_-kpPBc9T0
Mad News - https://youtu.be/snZq-1TGmE8
Flight Commander 2 - https://youtu.be/NJOJL_sSXUw
